about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the heart of the Vietnam War with "Good Kill," a gripping first-person shooter (FPS) experience that puts you in the hot seat as a door gunner in a military helicopter. As the conflict rages on, you'll embark on adrenaline-fueled missions across treacherous landscapes, engaging in intense firefights against enemy infantry, customizable helicopters and guns in fortified positions.


The game is under development. Visuals does not represent end-quality of the game.

Experience the Thrills in the Good Kill!

Experience the adrenaline rush of the Vietnam War in 'Good Kill,' where you're thrust into the heart of the war as a door gunner. Engage in intense firefights, navigate dynamic environments, and upgrade your arsenal to dominate the battlefield. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable FPS experience.

The game is under development. Visuals does not represent end-quality of the game.

Challenges of combat

In "Good Kill," every decision counts as you navigate the challenges of combat. With different types of weapons at your disposal, including small arms and mounted guns, you'll rain down devastation on the enemy forces while maneuvering through dynamic environments filled with destructible objects and buildings. Adaptability is key as you upgrade your helicopter and weapons between missions, customizing your loadout to suit the ever-evolving demands of the battlefield.


The game is under development. Visuals does not represent end-quality of the game.

Bring the Vietnam War Era to Life

Prepare to be fully immersed in the chaos of war with stunning graphics, authentic sound effects, and pulse-pounding music that bring the Vietnam War era to life. Whether you're engaging in high-stakes rescue missions, defending key strategic locations, or providing fire support for ground troops, every moment in Good Kill is a test of skill, strategy, and courage.

The game is under development. Visuals does not represent end-quality of the game.

Make your mark on history

With a captivating single-player campaign featuring multiple levels and a variety of missions, "Good Kill" offers an unforgettable FPS experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Are you ready to take to the skies, dodge enemy fire, and become the ultimate door gunner? Join the fight in "Good Kill" and make your mark on history.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Good Kill!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 or 12 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: You can change in-game quality to get maximum performance
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce RTX 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: You can change in-game quality to get maximum performance

short_description: Good Kill is an immersive FPS game where players take control of a door gunner in a military helicopter during the Vietnam War. Engage in intense combat across destructible environments, complete missions, and upgrade your helicopter and weapons to dominate the battlefield.
